overview: An offbeat dark comedy that follows the life of the reclusive, karaoke loving and heartbroken Ben. But when he receives an unsolicited package from a mysterious delivery man, his stale dreary life is turned upside down, taking him on a wild ride that brings a new love into his life.
tagline: A film about loneliness and loveâ€¦ with a happy ending.
title: Monkey-Love, Please Hold
